description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Koftas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Kofta,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Chicken Koftas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cucumber, coarsely grated and squeezed to remove excess liquid

recipeInstructions.text: Put the chicken mince, garlic, cumin, ground coriander and fresh coriander in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper and mix well.
Using wet hands, make 12 even-sized sausage shapes from the mixture and thread on to skewers, pressing firmly. Grill for 10 minutes, turning occasionally, until cooked through and browned.
Meanwhile, mix together the yogurt, mint sauce and cucumber. Take the koftas off the skewers and serve in warmed pitta breads with salad leaves, tomatoes and the yogurt dressing.
